# A showcase of some palettes

Rseries contains beauty palettes to personalize plots with the style of series of  plataforms like Netflyx, Crunchyroll(Anime)  or local TV from Latin American Countries like Peru. The total list of palettes are : 

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE,fig.align="center")
```


## Netflyx family palettes 

### `lupin` | Lupin
```{r,message=F,warning=F,echo=F}
knitr::include_graphics("./pics/lupin.png", dpi = 144)
```
